title: Membrane Processes
description: An introduction of the theories of membrane separation processes with special emphasis on desalination, softening, THM precursors reduction using reverse osmosis and nanofiltration.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 6310 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CEE 6312 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
